name: .YYZ
summary: Learn about .YYZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a YYZ file with YoYo Games GameMaker. Doing so will allow you to view and edit the game development project your YYZ file contains. To open a YYZ file with GameMaker:
Navigate to and open your YYZ file.
If necessary, you can also decompress a YYZ file with any Zip-decompression utility, to extract the files it contains. Before doing so, you may have to rename the YYZ file to use the .zip extension.
